mapper.select: SELECT seq, title, contents, read_cnt as "readCnt", div, TO_CHAR(reg_dt,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS "regDt", reg_id AS "regId", TO_CHAR(mod_dt,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS "modDt", mod_id AS "modId" FROM pc_board WHERE seq = #{seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pc_board ( seq, title, contents, read_cnt, div, reg_id, mod_id ) VALUES ( #{seq}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{readCnt}, #{div}, #{regId}, #{modId} )
